description: Unique surrogate key identifying this attribute-value row; used for joins and deduplication.
Identifier of the attribute definition recorded for the project; likely a foreign key to an attribute/catalog table; confirm with SME.
Stored value for the attribute on this project; typically text storing numbers, dates, or codes from the attributeâ€™s domain.
Reference to the project the attribute value belongs to; foreign key to the projects master record.
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent update to this row, regardless of who or what made the change.
Timestamp of the latest user-initiated change (as opposed to automated/system changes); likely overlaps with last_modified; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user account that created this row.
Timestamp when a user created this row.
Identifier of the user account that last updated this row.
Timestamp of the most recent user-driven update to this row.
